name: Adventure Escape: Space Crisis
description:
Disaster strikes on a routine space mission! Can you escape and return to Earth?

Commander Morgan is in charge of delivering supplies to the Alliance space station. She arrives and discovers no one on the station is responding to her calls. Can you solve the mystery of the missing crew? Investigate the space station, search for survivors, and complete puzzles in order to return home!

Join millions of happy Adventure Escape players and see if you can survive the Space Crisis!

Play this premium escape game!

- Beautiful graphics bring the futuristic space station to life!
- Explore the space station and discover the mystery of the missing crew.
- Unique challenges: go on a spacewalk, use a mechanical arm, and build a jetpack!
- Solve devious puzzles and riddles!
- Get the whole game for FREE! You’re never forced to pay!
- Gather tools and items to help you survive!
- Memorable characters!
- It’s free! No registration, no hassles, just download and play.

Save the station and return home in Adventure Escape: Space Crisis!
